bibl.title: Three Robinson Papyri.
bibl.note: P. Robinson Inv. 2 = P. Duke Inv. G 97. Late Ptolemaic letter about the purchase of a house. Fayum (?), 1st cent (July 97?) B.C. - Inv. 3 = P. Duke Inv. G 98. Private letter. Fayum (?), 1st cent. A.D. - Inv. 5 = P. Duke Inv. G 99. Receipt for rent in kind. Theadelphia, November 6, A.D. 21.
Willis William H. and John F. Oates, Three Robinson Papyri.
141.4 P. Duke Inv. G 97; G 98; G 99
